OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupFossilsandArchaeology
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Distribution options for Fossils and Archaeology Ores.

OptionChoice.name: enableFossilsandArchaeology
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation handle Fossils and Archaeology ore generation?

Choice.description: Use Custom Ore Generation to handle Fossils and Archaeology ores.
Fossils and Archaeology ores will be handled by the mod itself.

OptionChoice.name: cleanUpFossilsandArchaeology
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation use the Substitution Pass to remove all instances of Fossils and Archaeology ore from the world? If the mod's oregen can be turned off in its configuration, then it's recommended to do so, as the substitution pass can slow the game significantly. If this option is disabled without disabling the mod's own ore generation, you'll end up with two oregens working at once, flooding the world with ore. Enabled by default to ensure the ores are completely removed.

Choice.description: Use the substitution pass to clean up Fossils and Archaeology ores.
Fossils and Archaeology ores do not need to be cleaned up by a substitution pass.

Choice.Description: Wide, thin, and flat disks of ore.
Large veins filled very lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Fossils is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: fsarFossilsFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Fossils and Archaeology Fossils distributions

OptionNumeric.name: fsarFossilsSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Fossils and Archaeology Fossils distributions

OptionChoice.name: fsarMountainFossilsDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Mountain Fossils is generated

Choice.Description: Wide, thin, and flat disks of ore.
Large veins filled very lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Mountain Fossils is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: fsarMountainFossilsFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Fossils and Archaeology Mountain Fossils distributions
OptionNumeric.DisplayName: Fossils and Archaeology Mountain Fossils Freq.

OptionNumeric.name: fsarMountainFossilsSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Fossils and Archaeology Mountain Fossils distributions
OptionNumeric.DisplayName: Fossils and Archaeology Mountain Fossils Size

Choice.Description: Wide, thin, and flat disks of ore.
Large veins filled very lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Permafrost is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: fsarPermafrostFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Fossils and Archaeology Permafrost distributions

OptionNumeric.name: fsarPermafrostSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Fossils and Archaeology Permafrost distributions

OptionChoice.name: fsarMountainPermafrostDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Mountain Permafrost is generated

Choice.Description: Wide, thin, and flat disks of ore.
Large veins filled very lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Mountain Permafrost is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: fsarMountainPermafrostFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Fossils and Archaeology Mountain Permafrost distributions
OptionNumeric.DisplayName: Fossils and Archaeology Mountain Permafrost Freq.

OptionNumeric.name: fsarMountainPermafrostSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Fossils and Archaeology Mountain Permafrost distributions
OptionNumeric.DisplayName: Fossils and Archaeology Mountain Permafrost Size

Substitute.name: fsarOverworldBlockSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Cloud.name: fsarFossilsCloud
Cloud.Description: Wide, thin, and flat disks of ore. Primarily, this distribution is meant to provide realistic distribution of stone in a strata formation.

Cloud.name: fsarFossilsPreferredCloud
Cloud.Description: Ore generation is doubled in preferred biomes.

Veins.name: fsarFossilsVeins
Veins.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore. Because they contain less ore per volume, these veins are relatively wide and long. Mining the ore from them is time consuming compared to solid ore veins. They are also more difficult to follow, since it is harder to get an idea of their direction while mining.

Veins.name: fsarFossilsPreferredVeins
Veins.Description: Ore generation is doubled in preferred biomes.

StandardGen.name: fsarFossilsStandard
StandardGen.Description: A master preset for standardgen ore distributions.

Cloud.name: fsarMountainFossilsCloud
Cloud.Description: Wide, thin, and flat disks of ore. Primarily, this distribution is meant to provide realistic distribution of stone in a strata formation.

Cloud.name: fsarMountainFossilsPreferredCloud
Cloud.Description: Ore generation is doubled in preferred biomes.

Veins.name: fsarMountainFossilsVeins
Veins.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore. Because they contain less ore per volume, these veins are relatively wide and long. Mining the ore from them is time consuming compared to solid ore veins. They are also more difficult to follow, since it is harder to get an idea of their direction while mining.

Veins.name: fsarMountainFossilsPreferredVeins
Veins.Description: Ore generation is doubled in preferred biomes.

StandardGen.Description: A master preset for standardgen ore distributions.
